Accountant Job at LEAM Consulting




        
    

        
        LEAM Consulting is a foremost consulting firm which stands out in areas of professional certification training, HR advisory services, Business Development/Startup and IT consulting services in Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accountant
Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are looking for an Accountant to manage all financial transactions, prepare and analyze financial statements and reports and to also contribute significantly to the supermarket overall success.


Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Prepare and post invoice for all sales (cash/Credit)
	Perform daily, weekly, and monthly reconciliation to ensure accurate records of financial transactions.
	Managing vendor information within the system, including setting up new vendors and maintaining existing vendor records.
	Comply with financial policies and regulations


Requirements


	HND / B.Sc Degree in Accounting, Finance or any relevant field
	2-3 years of proven work experience as an Accountant
	Hands-on experience in operating spreadsheets and accounting software (Quickbooks or SAGE 50)
	Proficiency in English and in MS Office
	Experience with general ledger functions
	Strong attention to detail and good analytical skills
	Professional certification is an added advantage.


Salary
N170,000 - N250,000 / month.

Method of Application
Interested & qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobs@leamconsulting.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: For more information, WhatsApp: 09047710414.

Female Guest Service Agent Job at Milestone Boutique Apartments




        
    

        
        Here at Milestone Boutique Apartments, we offer a variety of deluxe apartments suitable for a range of guests, whether you’re in Lagos on business or transit to other state or travelling out of the country, with your partner or family for a holiday, attending a conference or visiting.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Female Guest Service Agent
Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

The Role
     

            
    




	As a Guest Services Agent, you will be the first voice of Milestone Boutique Apartments, ensuring every call and enquiry is handled with warmth, professionalism and care.
	From transferring calls and taking messages to actioning guest requests, you will provide service that reflects Milestone Boutique Apartments’s crafted approach to hospitality and creates a seamless experience for our guests.


Responsibilities
You Will:


	Be proactive in ensuring all guests are welcomed and departed in a timely and appropriate manner. Make it memorable.
	Demonstrate an awareness of customer priorities, anticipate needs, and build rapport.
	Be fully briefed pre and post shift and be aware of VIP’s or guest with special needs. Be aware of company policy that affect your role and always respect the privacy of our customers.
	Answer incoming calls in a warm, friendly and hospitable manner
	Processing payments and maintaining accurate records
	Handling reservations and guest enquiries
	Accurately capture and update guest information
	Transfer calls, take messages and action requests efficiently and accurately
	Ensuring smooth front office operations
	Continuously capture guest preferences and maintain guest profiles in PMS.
	Ensure that all prescribed and designed process, systems, and standards are maintained.
	Ensure that guest problems are resolved effectively but avoided whenever possible.
	Communicate clearly between customer, reservations and housekeeping and other Milestone Boutique Apartments operating departments.
	Maintain guest balances, room credit availability and credit / deposits control policy.
	To ensure that the Company Health & Safety procedures are adhered to and implemented within the department.


Ideal Candidate


	Due to the nature of the work, the ideal candidate would be fully flexible in their approach to work and be able to work at night, through weekdays, weekends and public holidays.
	You bring excellent communication skills and ideally experience in a guest facing or call handling role, preferably within luxury hospitality. Organised, attentive and proactive, you take pride in creating memorable first impressions and seamless experiences for guests. With a warm personality and a collaborative spirit, you thrive in a fast paced environment and enjoy being part of a team that delivers
	Female only.


Salary
N100,000 / month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter (PDF ONLY) to: hire@mbalagos.com using "Female Guest Service Agent" as the subject of the email.
